subject: Horse Racing
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Decisions and Verdicts
organizations: New York State Racing and Wagering Board
lead_paragraph: A New York State Supreme Court judge granted the stay to allow Richard Dutrow Jr. to continue training horses as his lawyers work on an appeal.
snippet: A New York State Supreme Court judge granted the stay to allow Richard Dutrow Jr. to continue training horses as his lawyers work on an appeal.
